command.text: declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512), @$updateConflict nvarchar(512), @$deleteConflict nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã ca %s đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong danh mục ca làm việc.' else N'The Shift Code %s is invalid or already exists.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã ca %s đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'The Shift Code %s has been modified or deleted by another user.' end select @$updateConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Ca %s đã phát sinh, không thể sửa được.' else N'Cannot edit the shift %s. It has already been used.' end select @$deleteConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Ca %s đã phát sinh, không thể xóa được.' else N'Cannot delete the shift %s. It has already been used.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where ((ma_ca like rtrim(@ma_ca) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_ca) like rtrim(ma_ca) + '%')) begin select 'ma_ca' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_ca)) as message return end select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if not exists(select * from @@table where ma_ca = $ma_ca.OldValue) begin select 'ma_ca' as field, replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s', rtrim($ma_ca.OldValue)) as message return end if @ma_ca <> $ma_ca.OldValue begin if exists(select * from @@table where ((ma_ca like rtrim(@ma_ca) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_ca) like rtrim(ma_ca) + '%') and ma_ca <> $ma_ca.OldValue) begin select 'ma_ca' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_ca)) as message return end end
if @ma_ca <> $ma_ca.OldValue and exists(select * from hrdmctca where ma_ca = $ma_ca.OldValue) begin select 'ma_ca' as field, replace(@$updateConflict, '%s', rtrim($ma_ca.OldValue)) as message return end

declare @delta int select @delta = max(tg_den) from hrdmctca where ma_ca = @ma_ca select @delta = isnull(@delta, 0) + isnull(so_phut, 0) from hrdmca where ma_ca = @ma_ca select @delta = case when @delta > 1439 then @delta - 1439 else 0 end update @@table set tg_lech = @delta, datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where ma_ca = @ma_ca
if exists(select * from hrdmctca where ma_ca = @ma_ca) begin select replace(@$deleteConflict, '%s', rtrim(@ma_ca)) as message return end
